title: Which is the most interesting chapter of organic chemistry among students of 11th and 12th? - Quora

response.answer_text: Organic chemistry is itself very interesting😊, especially the part that it consists of a lot of exceptions. It's like a wonderful game with carbon and other elements. And to me, completing the reactions are like completing the level of the game😂… if someone asks me, what is my favourite branch of chemistry, I would say, of coarse! organic chemistry❤.. Coming to the point, for me, the interesting chapter for class 11 is hydrocarbons.. And, for 12th I don't know because there are still 3 months left for me to start class 12. Thank you!!! ❤❤
